text: 18.20: Mt 26.55; Ru 4.15; Zo 7.14; 7.26-28Zisas ana ŋgarkarav khaŋ nzuai, “Gu za kha gumgi gu mbigi nɨman hiiŋra kav, gu wo bunin gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuai. Gu zazera Fhe Bakɨme buni mbararagi pheni vhen kav, Fhe Bakɨme bunin mbe khɨvav mbe nzuai. Gu vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme phena bɨna vhen, mbe Zudaiŋ za kav phogia ga vhui ŋanen kav Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin mbe khɨvav mbe nzuai. Gu zorga kav buna thueŋ suaŋgi fhu.
